Description:
Job Summary:We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Marketing Manager to join our team in the hospitality industry. The Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to promote our brand and increase revenue. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in hospitality marketing, excellent communication skills, and a passion for creating engaging content.Key Responsibilities:Develop and execute marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive traffic and increase revenue
Manage and oversee all marketing campaigns, including email, social media, and advertising
Create engaging content for our website, social media channels, and other marketing materials
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop promotions and events that align with business objectives
Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities for growth
Analyze data to measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and adjust strategies accordingly
Manage the marketing budget to ensure maximum ROI
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practicesQualifications:Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field
5+ years of experience in hospitality marketing
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Excellent project management skills with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
Experience with digital marketing platforms, including email marketing, social media, and advertising
Strong analytical skills with the ability to analyze data and provide insights
Creative thinker with a passion for developing engaging content
Ability to work independently as well as part of a teamIf you are passionate about hospitality marketing and have a proven track record of success, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.Skills
Skills:
Strong project management, multitasking, and decision-making skills.
In-depth understanding of tools like Google Analytics, Cyfe, and analytical software like Excel.
Bachelor's in Marketing from a reputed educational institute with good command of all the necessary prerequisites in the field.
Expert communicator portraying professional verbal and written skills.
